New Records: Moussa Diabate is now the franchise record holder for rebounds in a game without a made shot.
Key Match Events: Brandon Miller scored 17 points in the third quarter, including five 3-pointers, leading a 23-2 Hornets run.
LaMelo Ball led a 21-4 Hornets run in the fourth quarter to secure the win.
LaMelo Ball swatted away a Myles Turner shot that led to a run out.
Tre Mann had a personal 8-0 run in the first quarter.
Post-Match Reflections: LaMelo Ball reinforced his NBA best fourth quarter scoring average.
The Hornets defense was incredible, especially in the second half, allowing just 57 points in the final three quarters.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Hornets visit a 1-7 76ers team that’s missing its two best players next.
